com.google.code.aoplib4j.aspectj.policy.compiletime
Class UseInterfacesAspect

java.lang.Object
  com.google.code.aoplib4j.aspectj.policy.compiletime.UseInterfacesAspect

public final class UseInterfacesAspect
extends java.lang.Object

Aspect implementing the item 52 ("Refer to objects by their interfaces") from the Effective Java (2-end edition). This is a partial implementation since it handles only the return value for the Collection and Map interfaces.

Author:
Adrian Citu

Field Summary
private static java.lang.String NO_IMPL_COLLECTION
          Pointcut containing the execution of the methods that returns an implementation of Collection and not an interface.
private static java.lang.String NO_IMPL_MAPS
          Pointcut containing the execution of the methods returning implementations of Map and not an interface.

          Default constructor.
